title: Leaders Talk About Peace and a Big Prize
summary: This news article talks about three main stories. First, the leader of Ukraine, President Zelenskyy, had a good talk with U.S. negotiators about a plan to end the war with Russia. They discussed ideas like withdrawing soldiers and creating a safe zone. Second, the Pope, who is the leader of the Catholic Church, spoke on Christmas Day. He said that Palestinians in Gaza are suffering and asked for all wars to stop worldwide. He gave blessings and wished for peace. Third, a person in Arkansas won a huge lottery prize of $1.8 billion, making their Christmas very happy. The article shares updates from different parts of the world.
